name: Video Tour of (Reconnected Access Memory) RAM Museum 2020
description:
Reconnected Access Memory or RAM Museum is my artwork in 2020, that has been showed at Asana Bina Seni, Biennale Jogja. Reconnected Access Memory (RAM) is a virtual museum that building in Minecraft game. This museum show many artworks that are marginalized in Indonesia, such as banned, censored, even destroyed by the authorities or civil groups.

Currently, I'm still in the process of developing RAM Museum, such as optimizing visual assets, servers and collecting other artwork. I'll allocate revenue from this object to the RAM Museum. If you collect this object, it automatically supports RAM Museum, and you can get access the RAM Museum (offline map and tutorial) if you want it, just emailing me a proof you have collected my object.
